headline: Will Analyst Support and Q3 2026 Outlook Shift Gen Digital's (GEN) Consumer Cybersecurity Narrative?
summary: Gen Digital Inc. has been highlighted as one of the best cybersecurity stocks to watch in 2026, drawing a recent Hold rating from RBC Capital and a Buy rating from UBS ahead of its fiscal Q3 2026 earnings release on February 5, following past guidance indicating strong revenue and earnings momentum. An interesting angle for investors is Gen Digitalâ€™s emphasis on integrated, easy-to-use consumer cybersecurity platforms, which positions it firmly in the growing market for digital safety...
